sentences.sContent: ON WHY THE POOR SHOULD BE HAPPY: “Nobody has the excuse of ‘lack of money’ for not being at peace and living in integrity,” writes one survey respondent of his family, with a touch of bitterness.
sentences.sContent_eng: ON WHY THE POOR SHOULD BE HAPPY: “Nobody has the excuse of ‘lack of money’ for not being at peace and living in integrity,” writes one survey respondent of his family, with a touch of bitterness.
sentences.sCn: 关于为什么穷人应该是快乐的：“没有人会因为没有钱这个借口而过的不平和和不完整，”某个调查对象在说到关于他的家庭的时候，带着一点痛苦的意味。
